title: Half-a-billion-year-old fossil reveals the origins of comb jellies

title_detail.value: Half-a-billion-year-old fossil reveals the origins of comb jellies

summary: One of the ocean's little known carnivores has been allocated a new place in the evolutionary tree of life after scientists discovered its unmistakable resemblance with other sea-floor dwelling creatures.

summary_detail.value: One of the ocean's little known carnivores has been allocated a new place in the evolutionary tree of life after scientists discovered its unmistakable resemblance with other sea-floor dwelling creatures.
